Package au.csiro.pathling.sql

Interface Terminology

public interface Terminology
Provides access to the FHIR terminology UDFs, including overloads where this makes it more convenient to use them.

  • Method Details

    • member_of

      @Nonnull static Column member_of(@Nonnull Column coding, @Nonnull String valueSetUrl)
      Takes a Coding or an array of Codings column as its input. Returns the column which, contains a Boolean value, indicating whether any of the input Codings is the member of the specified FHIR ValueSet.
      Parameters:
      coding - a Column containing the struct representation of a Coding or an array of such structs.
      valueSetUrl - the identifier for a FHIR ValueSet.
      Returns:
      the Column containing the result of the operation

    • member_of

      @Nonnull static Column member_of(@Nonnull Column coding, @Nonnull Column valueSetUrl)
      Takes a Coding or an array of Codings column as its input. Returns the column which, contains a Boolean value, indicating whether any of the input Codings is the member of the specified FHIR ValueSet.
      Parameters:
      coding - a Column containing the struct representation of a Coding or an array of such structs.
      valueSetUrl - the column with the identifier for a FHIR ValueSet.
      Returns:
      the Column containing the result of the operation

    • translate

      @Nonnull static Column translate(@Nonnull Column coding, @Nonnull String conceptMapUri, boolean reverse, @Nullable Collection<ConceptMapEquivalence> equivalences, @Nullable String target)
      Takes a Coding or an array of Codings column as its input. Returns the Column which contains an array of Coding value with translation targets from the specified FHIR ConceptMap. There may be more than one target concept for each input concept.
      Parameters:
      coding - a Column containing the struct representation of a Coding or an array of such structs.
      conceptMapUri - an identifier for a FHIR ConceptMap.
      reverse - the direction to traverse the map - false results in "source to target" mappings, while true results in "target to source".
      equivalences - a collection of translation equivalences (ConceptMapEquivalence) to include it the result.
      target - identifies the value set in which a translation is sought. If there's no target specified, the server should return all known translations.
      Returns:
      the Column containing the result of the operation (an array of Coding structs).

    • translate

      @Nonnull static Column translate(@Nonnull Column coding, @Nonnull String conceptMapUri, boolean reverse, @Nullable Collection<ConceptMapEquivalence> equivalences)
      Translates a coding using a concept map.
      Parameters:
      coding - a Column containing the struct representation of a Coding, or an array of such structs
      conceptMapUri - an identifier for a FHIR ConceptMap
      reverse - the direction to traverse the map - false results in "source to target" mappings, while true results in "target to source"
      equivalences - a collection of translation equivalences (ConceptMapEquivalence) to include in the result
      Returns:
      the Column containing the result of the operation (an array of Coding structs)
      See Also:
      • translate(Column, String, boolean, Collection, String)

    • subsumes

      @Nonnull static Column subsumes(@Nonnull Column codingA, @Nonnull Column codingB)
      Takes two Coding or array of Codings columns as its input. Returns the Column, which contains a Boolean value, indicating whether the left Coding subsumes the right Coding.
      Parameters:
      codingA - a Column containing a struct representation of a Coding or an array of Codings.
      codingB - a Column containing a struct representation of a Coding or an array of * Codings.
      Returns:
      the Column containing the result of the operation (boolean)

    • subsumed_by

      @Nonnull static Column subsumed_by(@Nonnull Column codingA, @Nonnull Column codingB)
      Takes two Coding or array of Codings columns as its input. Returns the Column, which contains a Boolean value, indicating whether the left Coding is subsumed by the right Coding.
      Parameters:
      codingA - a Column containing a struct representation of a Coding or an array of Codings.
      codingB - a Column containing a struct representation of a Coding or an array of Codings.
      Returns:
      the Column containing the result of the operation (boolean)

    • display

      @Nonnull static Column display(@Nonnull Column coding)
      Takes a Coding column as its input. Returns the Column, which contains the canonical display name associated with the given code.
      Parameters:
      coding - a Column containing a struct representation of a Coding
      Returns:
      the Column containing the result of the operation (String)

    • display

      @Nonnull static Column display(@Nonnull Column coding, @Nullable String acceptLanguage)
      Takes a Coding column as its input. Returns the Column, which contains the canonical display name associated with the given code in preferred language when specified.
      Parameters:
      coding - a Column containing a struct representation of a Coding
      acceptLanguage - the optional language preferences for the returned display name. Overrides the value of TerminologyConfiguration.getAcceptLanguage().
      Returns:
      the Column containing the result of the operation (String)

    • property_of

      @Nonnull static Column property_of(@Nonnull Column coding, @Nonnull String propertyCode, @Nonnull Enumerations.FHIRDefinedType propertyType, @Nullable String acceptLanguage)
      Takes a Coding column as its input. Returns the Column, which contains the values of properties for this coding with specified names and types. The type of the result column depends on the types of the properties. Primitive FHIR types are mapped to their corresponding SQL primitives. Complex types are mapped to their corresponding structs. The allowed property types are: code | Coding | string | integer | boolean | dateTime | decimal.
      Parameters:
      coding - a Column containing a struct representation of a Coding
      propertyCode - the code of the property to retrieve
      propertyType - the type of the property to retrieve
      acceptLanguage - the optional language preferences for the returned property values. Overrides the value of TerminologyConfiguration.getAcceptLanguage().
      Returns:
      the Column containing the result of the operation (array of property values)

    • property_of

      @Nonnull static Column property_of(@Nonnull Column coding, @Nonnull String propertyCode, @Nullable String propertyType, @Nullable String acceptLanguage)
      Retrieves properties of a concept.
      Parameters:
      coding - a Column containing a struct representation of a Coding
      propertyCode - the code of the property to retrieve
      propertyType - the FHIR data type of the property
      acceptLanguage - the optional language preferences for the returned property values. Overrides the value of TerminologyConfiguration.getAcceptLanguage().
      Returns:
      the Column containing the result of the operation (array of property values)
      See Also:
      • property_of(Column, String, FHIRDefinedType)

    • property_of

      @Nonnull static Column property_of(@Nonnull Column coding, @Nonnull String propertyCode, @Nonnull Enumerations.FHIRDefinedType propertyType)
      Takes a Coding column as its input. Returns the Column, which contains the values of properties for this coding with specified names and types. The type of the result column depends on the types of the properties. Primitive FHIR types are mapped to their corresponding SQL primitives. Complex types are mapped to their corresponding structs. The allowed property types are: code | Coding | string | integer | boolean | dateTime | decimal.
      Parameters:
      coding - a Column containing a struct representation of a Coding
      propertyCode - the code of the property to retrieve.
      propertyType - the type of the property to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the Column containing the result of the operation (array of property values)

    • designation

      @Nonnull static Column designation(@Nonnull Column coding, @Nonnull Column use, @Nullable String language)
      Takes a Coding column as its input. Returns the Column, which contains the values of designations (strings) for this coding for the specified use and language. If the language is not provided (is null) then all designations with the specified type are returned regardless of their language.
      Parameters:
      coding - a Column containing a struct representation of a Coding
      use - a Column containing use the code with the use of the designations
      language - the language of the designations
      Returns:
      the Column containing the result of the operation (array of strings with designation values)

    • designation

      @Nonnull static Column designation(@Nonnull Column coding, @Nullable Coding use, @Nullable String language)
      Retrieves designations of a concept.
      Parameters:
      coding - a Column containing a struct representation of a Coding
      use - a Column containing a Coding describing the use of the requested designation
      language - the language of the requested designation
      Returns:
      the Column containing the result of the operation (array of strings with designation values)
      See Also:
      • designation(Column, Column, String)
